record.title: HOUR OF MEETING ON TOMORROW
record.narrative:
HOUR OF MEETING ON TOMORROW -- (House of Representatives - January 17, 2008)

[Page: H335]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that when the House adjourns today, it adjourn to meet at 10:30 a.m. tomorrow, and further, when the House adjourns on that day, it adjourn to meet at 12:30 p.m. on Tuesday, January 22, for morning-hour debate.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Maryland?
